page.title: 06Blacko
page.content: Every year in Cribyn children go out to collect{Calennig.Calennig}is when people give you money when the New Year comes in. At night you go round{Blacko.Blacko}is when you dress in black clothes and put coal dust on your face so the people give you{Calennig}after they have guessed who you are. After you have given them five chances to guess and if theydo not know who you are you have to tell them. One year a boy dressed up in women's clothes and everybody thought he was a girl so they named girl's names instead of boy's names. Every year you collect about Â£3 to Â£6. Peaple usually give 10p to 20p. the most I've collected is Â£4.60. Some parents don't like their children go round Blacko because they think it cheeky to ask for money.
